front.title: STEP file analyzer and viewer user guide (update 6)

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: The STEP File Analyzer and Viewer opens a STEP (ISO 10303 - STandard for Exchange of Product model data) Part 21 file and (1) generates a spreadsheet or CSV files of all entity and attribute information, (2) creates a visualization (view) of part geometry, sketch geometry, graphical PMI annotations, supplemental geometry, and datum targets that is displayed in a web browser, (3) reports and analyzes any semantic PMI, graphical PMI, and validation properties for conformance to recommended practices, and (4) checks for basic STEP file format errors.

seriesInfo.name: NIST advanced manufacturing series; NIST AMS
